CExeFile.h

00001 /*
00002  * CExeFile.h
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 17.07.2009
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This special class reads the whole exe-file
00008  *  into the memory and manages stuff
00009  *  In later Games, like Keen 4. The Exe Files must be opened many times
00010  *  for several reason. We are trying to avoid this here, by pushing all data
00011  *  of the exe-file into our memory and do the operations here!
00012  */
00013 
00014 #ifndef CEXEFILE_H_
00015 #define CEXEFILE_H_
00016 
00017 #include "../fileio/crc.h"
00018 
00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <string>
00021 
00022 class CExeFile {
00023 public:
00024  CExeFile();
00025  
00026  char getEpisode();
00027  std::string getDataDirectory();
00028  std::string getFileName() { return m_filename; }
00029  size_t getExeDataSize();
00030 
00031  bool readData(const char episode, const std::string& datadirectory);
00032  int getEXEVersion();
00033  int getEXECrc();
00034  bool readExeImageSize(unsigned char *p_data_start, unsigned long *imglen, unsigned long *headerlen);
00035  
00036  unsigned char* getRawData();
00037  unsigned char* getHeaderData();
00038  unsigned char* getDSegPtr();
00039 
00040  ~CExeFile();
00041 
00042 private:
00043 
00044  struct EXE_HEADER
00045  {
00046   unsigned short mzid;
00047   unsigned short image_l;
00048   unsigned short image_h;
00049   unsigned short num_relocs;
00050   unsigned short header_size;
00051   unsigned short min_paras;
00052   unsigned short max_paras;
00053   unsigned short init_ss;
00054   unsigned short init_sp;
00055   unsigned short checksum;
00056   unsigned short init_ip;
00057   unsigned short init_cs;
00058   unsigned short reloc_offset;
00059   unsigned short overlay_num;
00060  };
00061 
00062  size_t m_datasize;
00063  size_t m_headersize;
00064  int m_episode;
00065  unsigned int m_crc;
00066  unsigned char *m_data;
00067  unsigned char *m_headerdata;
00068  unsigned char *m_rawdata;
00069  unsigned char *m_data_segment;
00070  std::string m_datadirectory;
00071  std::string m_filename;
00072 };
